text: In runtime you determine how you want the products to be used in the business logic, i.e. how you want to perform a lookup of products from a workflow by using APL. Here you can find descriptions of the APL functions that are used for looking up the products stored in the products database during provisioning. This chapter includes the following sections: APL - PCC Mapper Support - Buckets APL - PCC Runtime Support - Buckets APL - PCC BucketData Support - Buckets APL - PCC BatchData Support
title: Runtime APL Support for PCC Buckets - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
